actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the prevailing wage provisions of the Davis-Bacon Act to include subsistence allowances.

summary.text: Includes subsistence allowances in the prevailing wage provisions of the Davis-Bacon Act, specifying rates to be paid to laborers on public building and public works. (Amends 40 U.S.C. 276a(b)(2))

titles.title: A bill to amend the prevailing wage provisions of the Davis-Bacon Act to include subsistence allowances.
